entry.title: Shodan CLi - Python
entry.summary: Pre-work: sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get upgrade sudo apt-get install python-setuptools sudo apt-get install python2.7 sudo apt-get install python-pip sudo pip install shodan Code: Shodan Search import shodan SHODAN_API_KEY = "putyourownapikeyhereFROMSHODANwebsite" api = shodan.Shodan(SHODAN_API_KEY) try: #search Shodan results = api.search('net:69.91.192.0/24,69.91.193.0/24,69...

entry.title: HackTheBox - Heist
entry.summary: 10.10.10.149 root@kali:~/htb/heist# gedit /etc/hosts nmap -sS -sV -A -O -p- 10.10.10.149 nmap -vv 10.10.10.149 We find IIS running on port 80, MSRPC on port 135 and SMB on 445. Additionally, port 5985 Website Login as Guest Cisco router attachment: hostname ios-1 ! security passwords min-length 12 enable secret 5 $1$pdQG$o8nrSzsGXeaduXrjlvKc91 ! username rout3r password 7...

entry.title: US-CERT AKA CISA Alert-TA18-074A-Detection
entry.summary: This is a script to find ioc from US-CERT alert. <# .SYNOPSIS Get-US-CERT-TA18-074A.ps1 returns data about US-CERT Alert. https://www.us-cert.gov/ncas/alerts/TA18-074A .NOTES The next line is needed by Kansa.ps1 to determine how to handle output from this script. OUTPUT TSV Contributed by Jesse Moore #> Write-Host "*****PowerShell_Version******";$PSVersionTable.PSVersion.Major #Find OS...

entry.title: Kansa -How to Get-Started
entry.summary: Introduction This is a place to keep my notes on various projects so I don’t forget. If not so, you can give it a read from here. This guide aims to provide a starting place for Kansa PowerShell in an Active Directory network. You may refer to this as a Cheat-Sheet also. This article will not contain everything you need to know about PowerShell. The following topics will be covered in a l...
